attributes.action: Legislate that Richard Hammond should appear daily on the television to maintain that feel good factor and happiness amongst the female population of Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the modern world where 9 to 5 rarely exists, it's more like 5 to 9, ever increasing taxes and the pressures of life leave the female population of this Country with little to look forward to.  A daily dose of the aforementioned, Mr Richard Hammond, would increase happiness, productivity and general wellbeing. So, come on girls, sign for more of Richard.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
